Row.Text: Welcome to the lands of Macedon, leader! You have come to swear your allegiance to me, I presume? No? Not a problem, I'll enjoy sparring with you later to make you do so! Make it a good fight!

Looks like this is the end of my reign. I will grieve for the men I've lost, and weep for the lands I will no longer own...but I will regret nothing. You put up the greatest fight of my life. Never regret what you've done.
Hrmm. I wasn't looking to pick a fight with you, but the King of Conquerors never backs down from a challenge! Come, then!

True, your armies outnumber even my own. But is your might as a ruler as strong as mine? My willpower is equal to that of all my men combined -- and I imagine one of my men has more bravery than fifty of yours!

I won't stop you if you want to fight. But your judgment seems very foolish. Why lead those men, who put their utmost faith in you, into a hopeless battle? Or perhaps you see some way of coming out victorious? Haha, I'm not gonna let that happen!
Excellent! Come, let us revel in the glory of a great battle! Bucephalus...today, we ride!

Truly, if I am able to vanquish you, I will eliminate any of those tiny doubts in the backs of my soldiers' heads that I am the King of Conquerors. You are a great and powerful foe, but I know that my strength as a ruler is unrivaled!
Well, far be it for me to complain about a ruler willingly marching his troops to their doom so that I may conquer their lands with ease!
Hail, friend! I've got a whole barrel of wine with our names on it right here! Now, what did you want to talk about?
I must commend your bravery for coming to talk to me face-to-face after the things which have transpired between us. There is little else to commend, though.
Your lands stand between me and the shores of Okeanos! I shall pass through them while making them mine! Come, defend yourself to the best of your ability!
They don't call me the King of Conquerors for no reason! Allow me to demonstrate how I earned that title!
I thirst for a good fight! Oblige me!
Your lands stand between me and the shores of Okeanos! I shall pass through them while making them mine! Come, defend yourself to the best of your ability!
They don't call me the King of Conquerors for no reason! Allow me to demonstrate how I earned that title!
I do hope you are working on improving that pathetic army! When I come to take your lands, I want there to be a fight worthy of an epic poem!
Make sure you give that army you're fighting a good battle! I enjoy learning of battles I didn't participate in, so let us talk about it once you've returned victorious.
